a: Ballpark pricing: • Standard home cleaning from ~$120 • Deep clean from ~$180 • Mobile detailing from ~$89 • Full detail from ~$199. For an exact quote, tell me your city plus: (A) Cleaning → bedrooms & bathrooms, or (B) Detailing → vehicle type + interior/exterior.

Sure—fast quote. Reply with one:
A) Cleaning (standard/deep/move-out): city + bedrooms/bathrooms
B) Detailing (interior/exterior/full): city + vehicle (sedan/SUV/truck)
I’ll reply with a ballpark + first available slot.
We’re available 7 days a week by appointment. Same-day slots are often open—text or book to check today.
We serve all of Horry County: Myrtle Beach, North Myrtle, Conway, Surfside, Garden City, Murrells Inlet, Socastee, Carolina Forest, Little River, Aynor, Loris—and nearby.
Mobile Detailing: exterior wash, wheels/tires, windows, interior vacuum/wipe, and add-ons like shampoo and odor treatment. We come to you.
Cleaning Services: standard, deep, move-in/out, and Airbnb turnover. We bring supplies and can accommodate special requests.
We bring all standard supplies and pro-grade, surface-safe products. We can use eco/pet-safe options or your preferred brands—just let us know.
Book a quick 15-minute call here: https://calendly.com/benchlinehq/30min
Most standard cleanings take 2–3 hours for an average home; mobile detailing usually runs 1.5–3 hours per vehicle depending on package.
We accept cards, cash, and most popular apps. Invoices/receipts provided.
Yes—licensed and insured. Happy to provide documentation upon request.
Recurring discounts are available for weekly, biweekly, and monthly plans. Ask about first-time client specials and bundles.
Often yes—same-day or next-day is possible depending on route openings. Tell me your location and ideal time and I’ll check the first available slot.
You can reschedule or cancel—no fee with 24+ hours’ notice. Same-day changes may incur a small fee to cover routing.
